title: My Friend Misty
overview: The animated and live-action hybrid sees colourful and magical Misty, help children navigate everyday situations by teaching them brilliant tips to stay calm and strategies that will help them move forward. Whether it's feeling nervous about going to the dentist, arguing with their best friend, or getting their hair cut, the series highlights that children have worries too.  Fortunately Misty is on hand to help. She pops up with surprise visits in each episode to help and inspire kids, with a sprinkle of mischief along the way.
